basics.label: Software Engineer/Architect
basics.name: Vikas Chouhan
basics.summary: I have ~12+ years of experience in professional software development across various domains such as low level embedded software, application level infrastructure tools development and recently data analysis and applied machine learning. I graduated with a B.E. degree in Electrical Engineering in 2009 and currently working at Nurithm Labs Pvt Ltd as an engineering cofounder for last 2+ years.

work.summary: As an engineering cofounder, I am responsible for driving the engineering side of the business.That includes product development, research, testing and deployment as well as mentoring new hires such as interns etc.
highlights: Research and development activities for developing and training suitable neural network architectures for detecting 20 common skin disease conditions.
Experimenting with various preprocessing and postprocessing schemes for arriving at an optimized training/inference pipeline for our particular usecase.
Reading research papers and converting them to prototype implementations (openmax, SVM, Deep open classifier, Log softmax, Spherical softmax, Convolutional block attention modules etc).
Experimenting with visualization algorithms (activation maps, occlusion maps, grad cam, guided backprop etc) as part of interpretable AI effort.
Contributing (technical writing, results generation and analysis etc) to various journals which we worked on in collaboration with our partner doctors.
Scaling the classification model from 20 classes to 40 classes and eventually 55 classes by the end of 2019. Using ensembles for improving performance.

work.summary: I was part of Partner Enablement team, responsible for handling technical queries and issues from ARM Licensee partners in process of getting their cores ARM compliant.
highlights: Working as a bridge between ARM partners and internal development teams, facing customer issues and helping to resolve them.

work.company: NXP India Pvt Ltd (Formerly Freescale Semiconductor India Pvt Ltd)
work.summary: I was in Digital Networking Group's post silicon validation team taking part ownership of multicore CPUS & cache subsystem across various SOCs.
highlights: Test development (in C & PowerPC assembly) for targeting cache coherency & memory consistency in multicore microprocessors.
Test development (in C & PowerPC assembly) for verifying shared resources such as fpu, simd etc. inside an Symmetric Multi Threaded microprocessor.
Bare-metal test framework development (in C/C++, ARMv8 assembly and Python) to develop & run powerful pseudo-random algorithmic assembly tests.
Small projects involving LTE and IOT software stacks.

work.company: NXP India Pvt Ltd (Formerly Freescale Semiconductor India Pvt Ltd)
work.summary: I was part of Digital Networking Group's Silicon Bringup Team working primarily as tools and infrastructure developer.
highlights: Development and maintenance of various infrastructure tools (in C, Perl and Bash), doing enhancements, resolving internal issues etc.
Porting several tools from SunOS to Linux.
